name: pgo
description: PostgreSQL dedicated ORM with automatic schema sync, table inheritance and much more

scripts.test:
echo '.gitignore
.travis.yml
doc*
test' > .npmignore ; cat .gitignore >> .npmignore
  ./node_modules/.bin/jshint lib test doc.js || exit 1
  ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive test

author: Daniele Ricci <daniele.icc@gmail.com> (https://bitbucket.org/cicci)
